headline: ChatGPT Thinks Datadog Stock Will Close At This Price By The End of 2025
summary: With Wall Street's year-end tape thinning and traders increasingly watching for momentum heading into 2026, Datadog (NASDAQ:DDOG) has shown a blend of strong fundamental growth and short-term technical fatigue. After a strong earnings beat and upbeat ...

headline: A Subpar Year for Software Stocks. 3 Charts Point to a Turnaround.
summary: Microsoft  the only $1 trillion software company, has gained just 5% over the past year.  As the second-largest holding in the iShares ETF behind  Palantir  Microsoft’s next move could dictate the overall flow of software stocks.  Bulls can remain vigilant above $464 where a double bottom base could take shape.

headline: Can Datadog's Strong Enterprise Base Drive the Next Growth Phase?
summary: DDOG's enterprise-focused platform strategy is gaining traction as large customers standardize observability stacks.
